llm_extraction.paper_id: 全髋关节假体滑动面磨损与组合面微动腐蚀研究_杨抒
llm_extraction.体外实验_内衬与球头摩擦腐蚀实验_球头腐蚀实验结果: {"腐蚀源": "taper/trunnion interface", "腐蚀机制": "wear and corrosion interaction", "保护层": "adsorbed protein layer"}
llm_extraction.体外实验_内衬与球头摩擦腐蚀实验_球头表面成分分析: {"分析位置": "taper/trunnion interface worn area", "成分组成": "tribolayer mainly composed of graphitized carbon"}
llm_extraction.体外实验_球头与锥颈界面微动腐蚀实验_球头与锥颈_实验设置: {"测试条件": "walking gait", "润滑液类型": "serum solution"}
llm_extraction.体外实验_球头与锥颈界面微动腐蚀实验_腐蚀与磨损实验结果: {"主要腐蚀源": "taper/trunnion interface", "腐蚀机制": "cyclic change due to formation and disruption of adsorbed protein layer", "磨损区域特征": "tribolayer composed of graphitized carbon", "保护机制": "tribolayer and adsorbed protein layer inhibit corrosion by isolating metal surface from serum solution"}
